description:
Press the start button, and start the game!


We couldn't wait to share with you our experimental game made in Figma, we hope everyone will like it! Woohoo


EerieGlow is a simple, experimental game based on the logic of mazes.


During the game, we have to get our character (Eerie) to the Figma logo, which is the goal, so you can only enter fields that have objects on them.
